rules_text:
This creature enters with X +1/+1 counters.
Whenever a player would cast a spell with mana value equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on this creature, counter that spell.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put its counters on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
